name: Balance the Ethan
description:
This is an 3D Platformer Game. Ethan is a Player where you walk, running and jump, Find the Key cube to unlock the another key (in level 2-4), balance the player also do not falling in the water, walk in the bridge, maze, cube obstacle, pipes and book. Find the green cube for finishing the level.

Controls: WASD for Movement and Space Bar for Jumping. Press "esc" for back to Select Scene.

Credits: Uplifting Loop by TFSui, Cope! Free Skybox Pack by Scrycoast, Standard Assets and Sky5X One by RKD (There's more in the game)
